data.text: Congratulations on choosing to be a better person/best mother in the most adverse of situations.

not Khloe or Tristan's gf.  you put TRUE on top of everything and everyone.  Heck , you even thought about not keeping him from living such experience because of his 1 STUPID mistake. I went through the exact same, I know the why behind your actions. I too dont regret it! ....
